Title: Object: Riposo della S. Vergine e di S. Giuseppe arrivati in Egitto
Series: Raccolta di 112 stampe di pitture della storia sacra
Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt, after Luca Giordano: a landscape with in the left foreground the seated Virgin suckling Christ Child, St Joseph reclining nearby and looking on, cherubic heads hovering above; to the right, a river Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: See 1865,0520.773 for comment on series. For painting (now lost) see Ferrari/Scavizzi, 'Luca Giordano, l'Opera Completa', 1992, p.406 and fig. 1087.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: A E Evans & Sons (sale Sotheby's, 24-7.iv.1865/970)
